ModMetaData.name: [sd] floorpaint
ModMetaData.author: sulusdacor
ModMetaData.description:
"[sd] floorpaint" Ver.: 1.0-1.0.0
"simple shapes to make stuff -> totally necessary to not get your colonists killed!!!!!!"
- adds 1 research paint - adds item paintbucket - adds recipe to make paint bucket at stonecutter table - adds category and in there a bunch of shapes that you need (you can build on top of them)
Does not add more colors. It uses fabric+leather to color pick. For more color variety you might want to get additional mods.
Download links for Dropbox or Steamworkshop link can be found in the ludeon forum thread linked above.
